feat: enhance project configuration and add i18n documentation

- Add internationalized documentation

  - Create docs/README.zh-TW.md (Traditional Chinese version)
  - Include installation, quick start, architecture, and development guides

- Add CLAUDE.md for Claude Code integration

  - Explain core pipeline architecture
  - Describe implementation patterns

- Update .gitignore to exclude .serena/ directory
